bibl.title: Acknowledgment to Jesse W. Lazear for a contribution made to John Hopkins University, January 1, 1897

div1.p: The trustees of Johns Hopkins thank Lazear for his donation.

div1.head: Acknowledgment to Jesse W. Lazear for a contribution made to John Hopkins University, January 1, 1897
div1.p:
The Johns Hopkins University
of Baltimore
January the First, A.D. Mdcccxcvii

By its Trustees and Faculty
The Johns Hopkins
University
of Baltimore
returns its most grateful acknowledgments to
Jesse W. Lazear
and to all others who have contributed to its
relief in a time of financial loss and anxiety
The names of these generous promoters of ad-
vanced education in the city of Baltimore will
long be remembered By their liberality a fund
of nearly a quarter of a million dollars has been
secured for the maintenance of the University
To all who are engaged in the service of this in-
stitution this timely support is most encouraging

D.C. Gilman
President of the University

C Morten Stewart
President of the Trustees
